**2023-04-19 / @aclements, @adonovan, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **fs: standard implementations of FileInfo and DirEntry should implement fmt.Stringer** [#54451](https://go.dev/issue/54451)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **log/slog: ReplaceAttr gets Source struct instead of file:line** [#59280](https://go.dev/issue/59280)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **log/slog: add vet checks for variadic ...any inputs** [#59407](https://go.dev/issue/59407)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **log/slog: remove calls to Value.Resolve from slog core** [#59292](https://go.dev/issue/59292)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **context: add Merge** [#36503](https://go.dev/issue/36503)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **crypto/x509: add support for PBES2 private keys** [#39241](https://go.dev/issue/39241)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **fmt: add an additional %j verb to wrap errors** [#58107](https://go.dev/issue/58107)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **log/slog: add an 'error' field to 'Record'** [#59364](https://go.dev/issue/59364)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **log/slog: builtin support for helper functions** [#59145](https://go.dev/issue/59145)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **math: add Clamp function** [#58146](https://go.dev/issue/58146)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **strconv: Add Parse\[T]** [#57975](https://go.dev/issue/57975)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **time: Add RFC3339Milli and/or RFC3339Micro convenience constants to standard library** [#36472](https://go.dev/issue/36472)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **log/slog: JSONHandler should format everything like json.Marshal** [#59345](https://go.dev/issue/59345)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **log/slog: change constructors to NewXXXHandler(io.Writer, \*HandlerOptions)** [#59339](https://go.dev/issue/59339)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **log/slog: change slog.Group signature to ...any** [#59204](https://go.dev/issue/59204)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **os: make DirFS implement ReadFile, ReadDir** [#53761](https://go.dev/issue/53761)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **spec: infer type arguments from assignments of generic functions (reverse type inference)** [#59338](https://go.dev/issue/59338)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **all: add plan9/arm64 port** [#57540](https://go.dev/issue/57540)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **log/slog: copy Logger by value instead of pointer** [#59126](https://go.dev/issue/59126)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **time: new Init() and Start() methods for Timer** [#54870](https://go.dev/issue/54870)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

  - commented

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing

  - commented

  - commented
- **html/template: expose errJSTmplLit** [#59584](https://go.dev/issue/59584)
  - added to minutes
- **io/fs: add writable interfaces** [#45757](https://go.dev/issue/45757)
  - commented
- **path/filepath: add FromFS to safely convert a slash-separated path into an operating system path** [#57151](https://go.dev/issue/57151)
  - discussion ongoing
- **sort: add Ordered, Min, Max** [#59488](https://go.dev/issue/59488)
  - commented
- **spec: lazy init imports to possibly import without side effects** [#38450](https://go.dev/issue/38450)
  - added to minutes
- **testing/cmp: add new package** [#45200](https://go.dev/issue/45200)

  - commented
- **text/template, html/template: Add ExecuteFuncMap and ExecuteTemplateFuncMap** [#54450](https://go.dev/issue/54450)
  - discussion ongoing
- **time:  add binning** [#54392](https://go.dev/issue/54392)
  - commented

  - discussion ongoing

  - discussion ongoing
